Html: Would it be possible to port WabbitEmu to iOS? There was a thread made in 2011 that said someone was working on it, but stopped because Apple didn't allow programs that could execute arbitrary code. This restriction has been removed, (see Codea, Pythonista, HAND BASIC, and many others). Even if Apple didn't allow it on the AppStore, I would still be interested in it because it could still be installed if the user were jailbroken.
